Posts.Content: I had a lump that didn't feel right and have always had regular mammograms. I went to doc and he sent me for a mammogram and ultrasound and both test showed something abnormal. They did a core biopsy and sent it to be tested. Preliminary test show a non cancerous tumor but they have sent it to another lab for a second opinion. Has anyone ever had their second opinion come back diffferent and is this routine for them to do?
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Biopsy

Posts.Content: I did not have to have booster rads! Thank goodness! But had I had to have them I was told that I would have a break between.
Posts.Title: question about rads
